snippet.textDisplay: The only game they’ve remade to this extent. Clearly a fan favorite. Can’t wait to play this some day. I have a feeling that the animification will ruin the game somewhat for me. When I played the game I didn’t know much about anime. I didn’t really see all those influences in the original, which, sorry to say, I don’t really care for.

snippet.textDisplay: Square Enix, if you're listening, since more summons are going to be on the board with Part 1 it would be cool if you had two different types of materia; materia found in nature and synthetic materia that was created. This way summons, spells, and skills could become stronger and would need to be switched over in future installments. This would also open up quests and game play in the future. Just an idea.
snippet.textOriginal: Square Enix, if you're listening, since more summons are going to be on the board with Part 1 it would be cool if you had two different types of materia; materia found in nature and synthetic materia that was created. This way summons, spells, and skills could become stronger and would need to be switched over in future installments. This would also open up quests and game play in the future. Just an idea.

snippet.textDisplay: WAIT!! it got pushed back to April 10 now??  and... did I just hear Cloud call Aeris.. Aerith like they had her name originally in Final Fantasy VII?  So is Barrett really gonna be called Bullet, and Cloud, Claude?  I can't wait for it!!
snippet.textOriginal: WAIT!! it got pushed back to April 10 now??  and... did I just hear Cloud call Aeris.. Aerith like they had her name originally in Final Fantasy VII?  So is Barrett really gonna be called Bullet, and Cloud, Claude?  I can't wait for it!!

snippet.textDisplay: I fucking lost it. I'm a 29 year old man and I balled my eyes out. I'm so overwhelmed this comes out in 2 more months. The want for a remake has been over 15 years, the announcement was 5 years ago. I was 12 when I first played FF7, and I will be 30 when I play this Remake. I replayed the original at least ten times through out my life, and I still want this more than anything else in the world. Thank you SquareSoft, thank you Square Enix.
snippet.textOriginal: I fucking lost it. I'm a 29 year old man and I balled my eyes out. I'm so overwhelmed this comes out in 2 more months. The want for a remake has been over 15 years, the announcement was 5 years ago. I was 12 when I first played FF7, and I will be 30 when I play this Remake. I replayed the original at least ten times through out my life, and I still want this more than anything else in the world. Thank you SquareSoft, thank you Square Enix.

snippet.textDisplay: People who called this game a cash grab have no idea what they're talking about. This is a game built from the ground up with heart and soul poured into every corner and it shows. Who cares if it comes in parts if they all look like this and play well. You want to talk about a real cash grab? Look no further than Blizzard's Warcraft 3 Reforged. Square Enix did it right just like Capcom did with RE2:Re.
snippet.textOriginal: People who called this game a cash grab have no idea what they're talking about. This is a game built from the ground up with heart and soul poured into every corner and it shows. Who cares if it comes in parts if they all look like this and play well. "What the hell is he!?"
"Did he just talk!?"

snippet.textDisplay:
Bruh like 20% of y'all wasn't alive when the original came out. And roughly 10% was alive when they tried to remake it back in late ps2 and told us itll be out for ps3 then scrapped it and now at this point i wouldn't be surprised if they pulled this for a 3rd god knows maybe 4th time. Yall thought kh3 took long nah this remake was supposed to happen around kh1 😭
Edit im not mad shiet I'll be happier if it was ps5
